resources.string: My name is Juan David Olarte Gomez, born in Medellin on November 18, 1992 raised in a humble family with the necessary resources for a good training, both as personal and academic, I have delved into various topics throughout my youth, such as languages, business, etc ... finally coming to the field of technology in the area of software development which I find challenging and fun We will continue taking slow but safe steps within an area which always caused me a lot of curiosity.
